name: Explorium AgentSource
description: Access live company and contact data through Explorium's AgentSource MCP server.
long_description:
This extension connects Claude to Explorium's AgentSource platform, enabling access to comprehensive company and contact data. Search for companies, find contacts, get detailed business information, and access real-time data to enhance your AI workflows.

The extension provides tools for company search, contact discovery, and data enrichment through Explorium's powerful data platform.
